name: Mount Prospect Academy Inc.
specialty: Residential Treatment Facility  Emotionally Disturbed Children

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Mount Prospect Academy Inc. is a Residential Treatment Facility  Emotionally Disturbed Children provider based in Plymouth, NH. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $76.5M in Medicaid payments across 16K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $76.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
